example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 围网)) (VP (PP-MNR (P 以) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 捕捉) (NP-OBJ (NN 鲣鱼))))) (VP (VV 为主))))

(IP (ADVP (AD 恐怕)) (NP-SBJ (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (VP (VA 多)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 理性) (NN 分析))) (PU 、) (NP (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (VP (VA 丰富)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 资讯)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 未)) (VP (VV 必) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VV 捕捉) (DER 得) (VP-EXT (VV 及)))))))
